sections.hero: Main landing section with name and title

hero.name: Maria Kiani
hero.title: AI Engineer | Data Scientist | 14+ Years Experience in Data
hero.subtitle: Business Impact through AI & Machine Learning
hero.summary: With Master's degree in Software Engineering and over 14 years of experience in Data area, I have helped companies to make value with using AI and Data. Moved to Germany in 2023 to advance my career, completed a second Master's degree focused on Data Science. Finalized an AI course, decided to transition into AI Engineering and combine my technical expertise with my business experience. Worked on AI project in industry.

about.title: About Me
about.content:
I am AI Engineer, combining 14+ years of data analysis experience with advanced machine learning expertise and AI Engineering. With a Master's degree in Software Engineering and a second Master's in Data Science in Germany, I specialize in creating business impact through data-driven solutions.

Throughout my career, I have helped companies to use AI as a empowering tools to reduce costs, increasing efficiency and accelarating business. I successfully trained over 2,500 junior analysts and have worked on AI projects in industry settings. After moving to Germany in 2023 to advance my career, I completed an AI specialization course and am now focused on combining technical AI expertise with business acumen.

skills.title: Technical Skills
skills._skill_instructions: üí° Add new categories by adding to both 'categories' and 'items'. The website will automatically create new skill sections.

experience.title: Professional Experience
experience._job_instructions: üíº Add new jobs to the 'jobs' array. Each job needs: title, company, location, period, type, description, link

jobs.title: AI Engineer and Data Scientist
jobs.description: Working on AI-Driven Digital Marketing Solution. Implemented an intelligent solution to assist registration of new users using LLMs, Python, OCR. Developed an automated system to generate SEO-Optimized content using Python, Fine-tuning OpenAI, OLlama, LangChain, HTML and Javascript. Developed a web application for extracting HR-related KPIs from PDFs and Images in 4 categories selected by user and store in Azure SQL to have agile insights on HR KPIs global standards using Azure AI services, Python, HTML, CSS, API programming and OpenAI. Developed a Customer Churn Prediction model for B2C company using Python. Developed chatbot with RAG using AWS AI Service, Python, Streamlit.

jobs.title: Professional Development
jobs.description: Finalized XRP and Bitcoin prediction project using time series deep learning models based on market analysis and sentiment analysis (Ordered by UK company). Completed a project-based course focused on AI developer topics, gaining hands-on experience to deploy AI solutions. Strengthened expertise in Azure AI, AWS, Deep learning through self-learning. Successfully finalized master's thesis in Fraud detection subject. Provided customer support for clients at previous company. Enhanced German language skills.

jobs.title: Data Analysis Consultant
jobs.description: Analyzed gold price news using Guardian API and Python, identified outliers in time series and researched their causes. Transformed Google Analytics data with dbt, visualized BigQuery data in Tableau, demonstrating that loyal customers account for 60% of revenue. Mentored junior analysts in SQL, Python, Power BI, and Excel. Quickly adapted to new processes and accelerated analytics projects.

jobs.title: Senior Data Analyst
jobs.description: Increased rebooking rate of a home service provider by 48% through data cleaning and A/B testing. Analyzed project processes and reduced costs by 32%, built star schema data warehouse and created Power BI dashboards. Defined metrics and dashboards for over 10 companies across industries including industrial adhesives, oil trading, crypto portfolios, e-commerce, hospitality, HR, and digital marketing. Responsible for ad-hoc reports, trained approximately 30 company employees, received performance bonuses for three consecutive years, and won major clients through innovative ideas.

jobs.title: Lecturer
jobs.description: Taught SQL Server, Excel, and Python programming to university students.

jobs.title: Data Analyst
jobs.description: Optimized IT processes for Iran's largest bank, created HR, product, and service dashboards using Power Query and Excel. Defined KPIs in coordination with stakeholders and received manager recognition for outstanding project performance.
